Description:
This Entertainers Paradise is your Private Sanctuary
Every lifestyle amenity is at your doorstep, whilst this entertainers dream boasts privacy and seclusion. Walk down a long leafy path to discover this superb, low-maintenance single-level oasis hidden away within Melbourne's most iconic retail and restaurant precinct.
An exceptional and sought-after address that features stunning and bright living and dining areas complemented by a separate modern kitchen. A master bedroom with walk-in robes and luxuriously large spa bath and marble floor en-suite is accompanied by two further bedrooms with built-in robes and a central second bathroom.
This functional and stylish home is further enhanced by traditional elements such as tall ceilings, Canterbury fireplace heater, original alcove window area with stained glass windows and polished floorboards that sit perfectly alongside modern appointments.
Surrounded by elegant landscaping, the entertaining areas include a covered pergola that brings together indoor and outdoor environments encased with beautiful white and purple wisteria. Also includes a storage room and shed for functionality.
This captivating South Yarra property enjoying complete independence, free from any common land or Body Corporate considerations also provides peace of mind with wrought iron security gates on the carpark and main entrance.
With off-street parking at the front, this comprehensively appointed residence is quite simply a sanctuary on the doorstep of Hawksburn Station. With Toorak Road and Chapel Street's vibrant cafes, restaurants, boutiques, Prahran Market, trams and trains a stroll away, inspection is a must.
